body.para: On Thu, Oct 09, 2008 at 01:20:53AM +0200, "Marco Trevisan (Treviño)" wrote:

quote.quotepara: Sorry, what do you exactly mean for hardware scrolling support (i.e. which is the user gain)?

body.para: you get a hardware-accelerated scrolling kernel console, e.g during non-quiet startup. It hurts my eyes every time I have to see the slow software-based unaccelerated glamo framebuffer scrolling on a kernel boot.
